asrm_q1.Description: Directions: Please read each group of statements carefully. Then pick out the one statement in each group which best describes the way you were feeling DURING THE PAST 30 DAYS by selecting the bubble next to that statement. If several statements in the group seem to apply equally well, select the  statement that applies to your feelings for the MAJORITY of the past 30 days. BE SURE TO READ ALL THE STATEMENTS IN EACH GROUP BEFORE MAKING YOUR CHOICE, and please do not skip any items.

Levels.0: I do not feel happier or more cheerful than usual.
Levels.1: I occasionally feel happier or more cheerful than usual.
Levels.2: I often feel happier or more cheerful than usual.
Levels.3: I feel happier or more cheerful than usual most of the time.
Levels.4: I feel happier or more cheerful than usual all of the time.
